positive.note:
To learn math we start at the beginning. 2+2=4.   To learn about God we start at the beginning.  God is good.  and we ask the next questions....  and create our individual journey, learning more about God.  The results will speak the truth - and bless us and everyone.

so we start here with a place holder - about how clean air is good,  and the  next thing in the negative column...

negative.note: Shakespear said "Notining is either good nor bad but thinking makes it  so.   Then let us think!   is poluted air bad?   is an error in math bad ? does error produce bad results ?     We must be aware of error before we can correct it.
